snippet: "Looking for a Missing Employee," about the troubling disappearance of a Lebanese government official, is the long overdue and too brief American debut of the actor and director Rabih Mroué.
abstract: "Looking for a Missing Employee," about the troubling disappearance of a Lebanese government official, is the long overdue and too brief American debut of the actor and director Rabih Mroué.
lead_paragraph: So often, political art makes us feel that the cure is as bad as the disease. Didactic, self-righteous and smug, full of easy slogans, this sort of art leaves people just as boxed in as the systems it supposedly critiques.

headline.main: Rabih Mroué at Coil Festival: Making Sense of a Mysterious Disappearance in Lebanon
